channel.title: sports-fashion on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in sports-fashion on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 JD Sports Logo
JD Sports Fashion plc, more commonly known as JD Sports or JD, is a British sports-fashion retail company based in Bury, Greater Manchester, England with shops throughout the United Kingdom, Europe, the United States, Asia, New Zealand and Australia. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. Pentland Group is the majority owner. In 2016 and again in 2019, JD Sports was profiled in British media amid allegations of mistreatment of its UK warehouse staff.
You can download theJDlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: JD
item.description: JD Sports Fashion plc, more commonly known as JD Sports or JD, is a British sports-fashion retail company based in Bury, Greater Manchester, England with shops throughout the United Kingdom, Europe, the United States, Asia, New Zealand and Australia. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. Pentland Group is the majority owner. In 2016 and again in 2019, JD Sports was profiled in British media amid allegations of mistreatment of its UK warehouse staff.
